locations: Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
imdb.plot outline: FIRST EPISODE (CAIPIRINHA EXPRESS): The competition has just begun. Let's meet the participants and discover that Brazil and the world give the best mix with Alejandro, Angie, Anne, Bruno, Carla, Cayolla, Esdras and Ryan. The presenter Guga invites the participants to taste a juice with the Brazilian fruit flavor. They do not know, but in the bottom of the cups, the future teams have already been formed. With the teams revealed, the Sunrise Mixers and Spicy Shakers teams set out for the kiosk where all the races will be held. During the journey in the vans, the curiosity is sharpened and the chat is consequence. Guga waits for them at the kiosk with a challenge: to prepare traditional caipirinhas, serve the clients and receive the judgment on the drink. Customers, on the other hand, are given the difficult task of enjoying the drink. After all, who does not like being around friends, around a bar table, and tasting a traditional drink? And they still have the privilege of having as backyard the beach of Copacabana. It remains to be seen whether the caipirinhas will be well served.
imdb.title: Rio Bar Brasil
plot: The integration of eight young people from different cultures and countries, living together in Rio de Janeiro. Commanded by Guga Rocha, the program shows the positive side of mixing and diversity.

FIRST EPISODE (CAIPIRINHA EXPRESS): The competition has just begun. Let's meet the participants and discover that Brazil and the world give the best mix with Alejandro, Angie, Anne, Bruno, Carla, Cayolla, Esdras and Ryan. The presenter Guga invites the participants to taste a juice with the Brazilian fruit flavor. They do not know, but in the bottom of the cups, the future teams have already been formed. With the teams revealed, the Sunrise Mixers and Spicy Shakers teams set out for the kiosk where all the races will be held. During the journey in the vans, the curiosity is sharpened and the chat is consequence. Guga waits for them at the kiosk with a challenge: to prepare traditional caipirinhas, serve the clients and receive the judgment on the drink. Customers, on the other hand, are given the difficult task of enjoying the drink. After all, who does not like being around friends, around a bar table, and tasting a traditional drink? And they still have the privilege of having as backyard the beach of Copacabana. It remains to be seen whether the caipirinhas will be well served.
